name: Cross Connect the Glow-ing Color Dots Pro
name_original: Cross Connect the Glow-ing Color Dots Pro
description:
If you enjoy puzzles you will surely Love 'Cross Connect Numbers'! Get ready to spend endless hours of enjoyment along your phone or Ipad with this Addictive and fun puzzle game.

Playing this exciting puzzle is very simple: connect the pairs of numbers without leaving any empty square on the board. Sounds easy but it’s really puzzling, so don’t underestimate this brain teaser.

Features:
> Mixture of Easy and Difficult Puzzles
> Different Board Sizes.
> Colourful Dots and UI
> Musical Sound Effects
> Turns mode, No Time Limit

So...Download the game and Enjoy....and must leave a review if you like this game.
